response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This unique item is valued at $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and the time invested in its creation. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1,150,000, providing you with a chance to secure it at a competitive price.

Please consider this proposal carefully. I am confident that the value this product offers will far exceed the investment you make. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
